biotools.summary:
A software package for correctly characterizing the topological development of ribbon structures.

Writhe Analysis Software Package (WASP) WASP is a software package for characterizing the topological development of ribbon structures particularly targeted at (but not limited to) use with molecular dynamics (MD) trajectories.

bioschemas.name: WASP
